label: Restricted countries
headline: Regretfully, residents of the following jurisdictions are not eligible to apply for SORA Card at this time
lead: High-Risk Jurisdictions subject to a Call for Action (i.e. "blacklist")
description: If you are a resident of any of the above-mentioned jurisdictions, please do not attempt to undergo the KYC process. Instead, please reach out to the SORA community through Telegram or Discord.
